duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and deliver leadership training on a large scale.
Conduct Train-the-Trainer sessions for manager training program with internal and external partners.
Coordinate the global delivery of manager training and elective leadership development programs.
Continually assess leadership development training needs using a data-driven approach.
Identify business skills training programs impactful to the organization's strategic direction.
Select and manage resources to develop and deliver training programs.
Optimize training processes for efficiency and staying within budget.
Manage technologies and collaborate with personnel required for training development and delivery.
Develop a plan to measure the impact of training programs.
Manage the quality of program/content design and delivery while ensuring a measurement strategy is in place to assess effectiveness.
Support teambuilding and team development efforts as required.
Serve as a consultant to the business for functional areas.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in education, human resources, instructional design, organization development or a related discipline (Master's preferred)
